title.narrative: Consultancy to Conduct the Gender Action Learning System(Gals) in 5 Provinces

description.narrative: Scope of the Assignment 1. Undertake desk review and context analysis of selected key national and sector level gender policies, plans and strategies 2. Conduct value -chain mapping and analyses in terms of the supported commodities by Enhanced Smallholder Agribusiness Promotion Programme (E -SAPP) to establish or confirm women's and men's roles, level of participation by gender along the value -chain, as well as the needs and interests of women and men to support empowerment of women and promote gender equality 3. Identify and map opportunities, challenges and risks for women's involvement in the Programme's interventions as part of the broader business case for working with women in supported commodity value -chains in terms of their value and contribution 4. Clarify and elaborate the E -SAPP's gender goal and objectives and ensure alignment to the overall Programme goal and development objective (PDO) 5. Clarify and elaborate the E -SAPP's gender mainstreaming strategy. The strategy should i) make reference to the women's and men's concerns (needs and interests) through -out the interventions process and ii) specify activities aimed at empowering women 6. Elaborate a measurement system for assessing gender mainstreaming and women empowerment, to be incorporated into the E -SAPP Operational Results Management Systems (ORMS) 7. In consultation with Programme Coordination Office (PCO) and key stakeholders, formulate gender sensitive indicators and set realistic targets at output, outcome and impact level for tracking and measuring progress of gender equality and women empowerment 8. Train selected provincial, district and PCO staff in gender mainstreaming and women empowerment and the GALS methodology.
